title: Don't Discard Your Mask (with Tracy Brabin)
itunes:title: Don't Discard Your Mask (with Tracy Brabin)
description:
As London Mayor Sadiq Khan moves to keep compulsory mask-wearing on local buses and trains, Tracy Brabin, Labour Mayor of West Yorkshire says she and Andy Burnham in Greater Manchester are moving in the same direction.

Brabin tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing most people want to keep wearing masks on public transport and that is the policy she is working on.

After the government won a vote to keep their reduction of the foreign aid budget, Mark Malloch-Brown, president of the Open Society Foundations joins to say why his organisation is stepping in to provide £93.5m emergency funding to cover some of shortfall in projects.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
As London Mayor Sadiq Khan moves to keep compulsory mask-wearing on local buses and trains, Tracy Brabin, Labour Mayor of West Yorkshire says she and Andy Burnham in Greater Manchester are moving in the same direction.

Brabin tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing most people want to keep wearing masks on public transport and that is the policy she is working on.

After the government won a vote to keep their reduction of the foreign aid budget, Mark Malloch-Brown, president of the Open Society Foundations joins to say why his organisation is stepping in to provide £93.5m emergency funding to cover some of shortfall in projects.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
